Subsection.title: Overview
Subsection.Paragraph: The looseleaf package is available from several sources:

Regardless of the distribution method, the looseleaf package will contain a command named looseleaf that acts as the main entrypoint to all of the package's functionality. The looseleaf command expects an environment variable named LOOSELEAF_HOME to be defined that points to the installation directory. See the documentation for the installation methods below for details.

Subsection.title: OCI Images
Subsection.Paragraph: The looseleaf package can be installed from Docker Hub using docker or podman.

The image is configured such that LOOSELEAF_HOME=/looseleaf, with the looseleaf command existing at /looseleaf/bin/looseleaf. The image is configured with the expectation that users will mount a volume at /looseleaf/etc containing a configuration file and space for the looseleaf database file. The container can otherwise be run without any privileges, and with a read-only root filesystem.

FormalItem.title: Run
FormalItem.Verbatim: $ podman run --read-only --volume /x/y/z:/looseleaf/etc:Z -i -t quay.io/io7mcom/looseleaf:${project.version} looseleaf info: Usage: looseleaf [options] [command] [command options] ...

Subsection.title: Maven Central
Subsection.Paragraph: A distribution package can be found at Maven Central.
The looseleaf command requires that a Java 17+ compatible JVM be accessible via /usr/bin/env java.
Verify the integrity of the distribution zip file:

FormalItem.title: Verify
FormalItem.Verbatim: $ gpg --verify com.io7m.looseleaf.cmdline-${project.version}-distribution.zip.asc gpg: assuming signed data in 'com.io7m.looseleaf.cmdline-${project.version}-distribution.zip.asc' gpg: Signature made Tue 28 Jun 2022 15:01:56 GMT gpg: using RSA key 3CCE59428B30462D10459909C5607DA146E128B8 gpg: issuer "contact@io7m.com" gpg: using pgp trust model gpg: Good signature from "io7m.com (2022 maven-rsa-key) <contact@io7m.com>" [unknown]

Subsection.Paragraph: Unzip the zip file, and set LOOSELEAF_HOME appropriately:

FormalItem.title: Extract
FormalItem.Verbatim: $ unzip com.io7m.looseleaf.cmdline-${project.version}-distribution.zip $ export LOOSELEAF_HOME=$(realpath looseleaf) $ ./looseleaf/bin/looseleaf info: Usage: looseleaf [options] [command] [command options] ...
